variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for Ontario 2025 tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 5.05% on the portion of income up to $52,886. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 9.15% on the portion of income over $52,886 up to $105,775. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 11.16% on the portion of income over $105,775 up to $150,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 12.16% on the portion of income over $150,000 up to $220,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 13.16% on the portion of income over $220,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_5 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all five brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
